thread.title: Qld s LNP proposes tougher DV bail laws - Yahoo7
thread.title_full: Qld s LNP proposes tougher DV bail laws - Yahoo7

author: Sarah Motherwell
title: Qld s LNP proposes tougher DV bail laws - Yahoo7
text:
Share Qld s LNP proposes tougher DV bail laws - Yahoo7 People charged with serious domestic violence offences will have a harder time getting bail under changes proposed by the Queensland opposition. 
Liberal National Party leader Tim Nicholls says he will introduce a bill in state parliament this week that would allow urgent appeals to those granted bail but also for GPS trackers to be fitted to alleged offenders released from custody. 
"The sooner we act, the sooner vulnerable women and children can feel safe knowing the law is working for them and not the alleged perpetrator," Mr Nicholls said on Sunday. 
National domestic violence helpline: 1800 737 732 or 1800RESPECT. In an emergency call triple-zero.
